attributes.action: Regulate The Flight Prices so that  they are the same all year round
attributes.additional_details: The normal working families do not afford to go anywhere during the school holidays with the kids do to higher costs. It is possible to get a flight for £10-15 during the school year but when it comes to school holidays the same flight it costs £200-£300.
attributes.background: To regulate the flights inbound/outbound of the UK so they are the same all year around not more expensive over the School holidays.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Ban holiday companies raising prices in school holidays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700540
